sn46.35:1.1: “Ayoniso, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppanno ceva kamacchando uppajjati, uppanno ca kamacchando bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati; anuppanno ceva byapado uppajjati, uppanno ca byapado bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati; anuppannanceva thinamiddham uppajjati, uppannanca thinamiddham bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati; anuppannanceva uddhaccakukkuccam uppajjati, uppannanca uddhaccakukkuccam bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati; anuppanna ceva vicikiccha uppajjati, uppanna ca vicikiccha bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati”ti.
sn46.35:2.1: “Yoniso ca kho, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppanno ceva satisambojjhango uppajjati, uppanno ca satisambojjhango bhavanaparipurim gacchati …pe… anuppanno ceva upekkhasambojjhango uppajjati, uppanno ca upekkhasambojjhango bhavanaparipurim gacchati”ti.
